abstract: On Tuesday night, the act vacuuming up all the attention at CMJ was Wild Flag, a new band comprised of members of old bands that also sounds like many recent bands who have looked to those old bands for inspiration.
snippet: On Tuesday night, the act vacuuming up all the attention at CMJ was Wild Flag, a new band comprised of members of old bands that also sounds like many recent bands who have looked to those old bands for inspiration.

headline.main: Wild Flag Is What Passes for an Inspirational Supergroup at CMJ
